reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 624/20: REGULATORY AUTHORITY - DESIGNATION AND DELEGATED PROVISIONS
reg_info.reg_name_text: REGULATORY AUTHORITY - DESIGNATION AND DELEGATED PROVISIONS

content.content: 1. The corporation known as Home Construction Regulatory Authority is designated as the regulatory authority.
content.raw_html: 1. The corporation known as Home Construction Regulatory Authority is designated as the regulatory authority.

content.section: Provisions delegated to the regulatory authority
content.content: 2. The following Parts and provisions of the Act are designated as delegated provisions for the purpose of subsection 2 (2) of the Act: 1. Part I. 2. Part III. 3. Part IV. 4. Part V. 5. Sections 80, 81, 82, 86, 86.1, 86.2, 86.3.
content.raw_html:
2. The following Parts and provisions of the Act are designated as delegated provisions for the purpose of subsection 2 (2) of the Act:

1. Part I.

2. Part III.

3. Part IV.

4. Part V.

5. Sections 80, 81, 82, 86, 86.1, 86.2, 86.3.

content.section: Provisions delegated to the regulatory authority
content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

content.section: Provisions delegated to the regulatory authority
